meanings.definition: Wooden paneling used to decorate walls.
meanings.sent1: The old mansion had beautiful boiseries adorning the walls.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's elegant interior featured intricate boiseries throughout.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the boiseries were perfect for sharpening its claws.
meanings.sent4: The boiseries in the room whispered tales of the past to anyone who listened.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the boiseries created a warm and inviting atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of decorating a room with wooden paneling.
meanings.sent1: She took great pride in the boiseries she added to the living room.
meanings.sent2: The boiseries transformed the plain walls into a work of art.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the boiseries were secret doors to a magical world.
meanings.sent4: His laughter filled the room as he worked on the boiseries, bringing life to the space.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh wood filled the air as they installed the boiseries in the room.
